data.text:
Harkins Theatres Valley Art Theatre

Celebrating 77 years in Arizona and headquartered in Scottsdale, Harkins Theatres is the largest family owned theatre chain in the country and the premier movie exhibitor of the Western U.S. operating more than 400 screens.

Address :509 S Mill Ave, Tempe, AZ 85281

Phone :+14804467272

Thunderbird Roadhouse

SW Corner 35th Ave & Thunderbird Rd. One of a kind restaurant and bar- Great food all made from scratch. Over 30 Craft Beers to choose from! Full Bar! Great Music all the time- Blues Wednesday Best Open Mic in the valley! Friday & Saturdays- Live Bands Like us on Facebook!

Address :3549 W Thunderbird Rd, Phoenix, AZ 85029

Phone :+16024396800
